about_the_game:
Portrait of a Torn: Demo Version

Step into the mystery and immerse yourself in the eerie atmosphere of Portrait of a Torn, a first-person narrative game where every shadow conceals a secret. In this demo, experience the opening chapter of Robert's haunting journey as he returns to a house veiled in silence and mystery.
As Robert, a young soldier confronting his past, you will explore a portion of the house’s unsettling rooms, solving cryptic puzzles and unearthing dark clues that hint at a deeper, tragic story. The demo introduces you to the full narrative and the mysterious, unsettling story that will define the complete game experience.

Key Features in the Demo:

• Intriguing Exploration: Navigate through select areas of the house, discovering clues and unraveling secrets hidden within its walls.

• Immersive Environment: Experience the meticulously crafted visuals and chilling sound design that set the tone for Robert’s unsettling adventure.

• Emotional Music: Engage with the evocative soundtrack, featuring haunting piano and violin compositions that enhance the mysterious and somber mood.

• Tease of a Dark Narrative: Uncover the first threads of a story woven with loss, mystery, and the shadows of the past.

This demo is just the beginning of your descent into a house filled with secrets, where every discovery brings you closer to the truth. Will you dare to take the first step into the shadows?
